list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a hard stony substance secreted by certain marine coelenterates as an external skeleton, typically forming large reefs in warm seas.

a sedentary coelenterate of warm and tropical seas, with a calcareous, horny, or soft skeleton. Most corals are colonial and many rely on the presence of green algae in their tissues to obtain energy from sunlight.
the unfertilized roe of a lobster or scallop, which is used as food and becomes reddish when cooked.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we had scallops with their coral, in their fluted shells
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đã có sò điệp với san hô của họ, trong vỏ sò của chúng
